attributes.action: The UK government to call a general election
attributes.background: The UK government must call a general election! This country cannot take any more of this Tory rule and so called austerity! It is time for them to step down! The poor are getting poorer whilst the rich are getting richer! Also disabled people are denied access to crucial social security

rejection.details:
We have received a large number of petitions about holding a general election, which are very similar to petitions we already have open. 
 
You might like to sign and share one or more of these petitions. 

Have another general election  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480

Hold a General Election in April 2019.  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235071

If Theresa May resigns as Prime Minister a general election must be held.  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/252449
